about_the_game:
Human defense is the successor of the End War RTS, a new way of playing, easy games, and re experience battle details



Human defense is a real-time strategy game inspired by modern science fiction. It only needs a few control methods to control the whole battlefield and reverse the defeat



Human defense is a story inspired by modern science fiction. It mainly starts the world war by human beings in order to compete for survival resources. Launching nuclear bombs has become a means of killing all countries.



In the human defense world, it is composed of seven camps, namely, the United States, France, Britain, Germany, Russia, Cuba and Libya. The powerful weapon units of each country are different. The United States' aerospace aircraft carriers and Russia's missile submarines have various characteristics



There are a large number of weapon units in the world of human defense, which are rich in land, sea and air. To expand your army, you need to obtain more minerals. Frantically occupy more resources is your primary strategic goal. Build more mines and more harvesters, use metal storms, laser towers and other defense buildings to hold your position, become a strong thunder fire tank, a long-range strike missile, an air king, an air carrier God's particles and nd500 warships are your powerful forces



In addition to human beings, human defense also has advanced alien races. Alien races can be crushed and developed. They are the strongest races in the world of human defense. Time resurrection technology is the trump card of alien races

name: Human Defense [RTS]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,Windows7
  • Processor: I3 3.20GHZ
  • Graphics: Support Dx11 graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,Windows7
  • Processor: I7 8 Core 3.20GHZ
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The earth was invaded by aliens, and human beings resisted alien species and deduced the most meticulous battle outcome with the simplest control method
